title: Thot or Not?
body: She talks 2 so many challenger guys who are thirsty for le poon and I cannot keep up with the amount of swag a challenger player can swag  off. I am only plat 2. She talks about how big the challenger guys are all the time and how im so small and plat 2. but she is nice 2 me and she is pretty cool herself. Do i continue to play league with this girl or do i look for someone without challenger friends to make me look bad? Pls help. Help needed here. Pls. Thanks.
